caption.p: Characterisation of infiltrating immune cells in the liver. ( A) Representative images of CD3ε staining. ( B) Representative images of CD107a staining. ( C) Representative images of CD19 staining. ( D) Representative images of CD163 staining. Nuclei were counterstained with Meyer’s haematoxylin. Scale bars = 25 μm. HEV hepatitis E virus, Sim simvastatin.
